ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: Servizzi ta' provvista ta' persunal inkluż impjegati temporanji
Usługi w zakresie pozyskiwania personelu, w tym pracowników sezonowych
Služby v oblasti zabezpečovania personálu, vrátane zabezpečovania pracovníkov na čas určitý
Storitve zagotavljanja osebja vključno z začasnim osebjem

Посреднически услуги по предоставяне на персонал, включително временна работна ръка

Usluge pribavljanja osoblja uključujući osoblje za rad na određeno vrijeme

TI_DOC.P: MK-Skopje: Personaleformidling, herunder midlertidigt ansatte

BLK_BTX.P: Personaleformidling, herunder midlertidigt ansatte

OLD.P: IV.2.4) Technical and professional capability of the economic operator:
Required documents for confirmation of the technical and professional capability of the economic operator:
Confirmation issued by the employment agency of Republic of Macedonia for the number of relinquished persons on monthly level during 2017 or M-PIN declaration for each month individually for 2017

Minimum criteria for determination of the technical and professional status of the economic operator: The bidder, through its own agency, must have minimum engagement of 250 persons during each month in 2017.
The new final date for submission of the offers or registrations of participation is: 14.5.2018 at 10:00 III.3.1) Final date for requests for clarifications: 8.5.2018 by 15:30

NEW.P: IV.2.4) Technical and professional capability of the economic operator:

Required documents for confirmation of the technical and professional capability of the economic operator: Confirmation issued by the employment agency of Republic of Macedonia for the number of temporary engaged persons for each month separately, for the period of the last 6 months, including March 2018.

Minimum criteria for determination of the technical and professional status of the economic operator: The bidder has signed over 250 employment contracts signed in each month separately, for the period of the last 6 months, including March 2018.
The new final date for submission of the offers or registrations of participation is: 14.5.2018 at 10:00 III.3.1) Final date for requests for clarifications: 8.5.2018 by 15:30
